## Putting all estimates together

```{r}
source("shared_code/load_mcmc.R")

res_list$B
mat <- matrix(NA, nrow = 700, ncol = 5)

library(progress)

pb2 <- progress_bar$new(format = "calculating mean... [:bar] :percent eta: :eta",
                        total = 700)
for (j in 1:700){
  pb2$tick()
  for (k in 1:5){
    cur_sum <- 0
    for (i in 1:length(res_list$B)){
      cur_sum = sum(cur_sum, res_list$B[[i]][j,k])
    }
    cur_mean = cur_sum/length(res_list$B)
    mat[j,k] <- cur_mean
  }
}
```
